unit.name: dimensionless
unit.description: a designation asserting the absence of an associated unit

unit.name: nominalMinute
unit.description: one minute excluding leap seconds, 60 seconds

unit.name: nominalHour
unit.description: one hour excluding leap seconds, 3600 seconds

unit.name: nominalDay
unit.description: one day excluding leap seconds, 86400 seconds

unit.name: nominalWeek
unit.description: one day excluding leap seconds, 604800 seconds

unit.name: nominalYear
unit.description: one year excluding leap seconds and leap days, 31536000 seconds

unit.name: nominalLeapYear
unit.description: one 366 day year excluding leap seconds, 31622400 seconds

unit.name: fahrenheit
unit.description: An obsolescent unit of temperature still used in popular meteorology

unit.name: Yard_Indian
unit.description: This is an ESRI unit and the multiplier comes from ESRI. It may not be accurate.

unit.name: Link_Clarke
unit.description: This is an ESRI unit and the multiplier comes from ESRI. It may not be accurate.

unit.name: Yard_Sears
unit.description: This is an ESRI unit and the multiplier comes from ESRI. It may not be accurate.

unit.name: inchCubed
unit.description: micromoles per square meter per second

unit.name: radian
unit.description: 2 pi radians comprise a unit circle.

unit.name: grad
unit.description: a plane angle equivalent to 1/400 of a full circle

unit.name: tonnePerHectare
unit.description: metric ton or tonne per hectare

unit.name: poundPerInchSquared
unit.description: micromoles per square meter per second

unit.name: milligramPerMilliliter
unit.description: micromoles per square meter per second

unit.name: acre
unit.description: 1 acre = 4046.8564 square meters or 1 hectare = 2.4710 acres

unit.name: bushelsPerAcre
unit.description: bushels per acre -- 1 bushel = 35.23907 liters/1 acre = 4046.8564 squareMeters

unit.name: bushelPerAcre
unit.description: bushels per acre -- 1 bushel = 35.23907 liters/1 acre = 4046.8564 squareMeters

unit.name: meterPerSecondSquared
unit.description: micromoles per square meter per second

unit.name: kilogramsPerMeterSquaredPerSecond
unit.description: kilograms per meter sqared per second

unit.name: gramsPerCentimeterSquaredPerSecond
unit.description: grams Per Centimeter Squared Per Second

unit.name: gramsPerMeterSquaredPerYear
unit.description: grams Per Meter Squared Per Year

unit.name: gramsPerHectarePerDay
unit.description: grams Per Hectare Squared Per Day

unit.name: kilogramsPerMeterSquaredPerYear
unit.description: kilograms Per Meter Squared Per Year

unit.name: gramPerCentimeterSquaredPerSecond
unit.description: grams per square centimeter per second

unit.name: gramPerDayPerHectare
unit.description: grams Per Hectare Squared Per Day

unit.name: gramPerMeterSquaredPerYear
unit.description: grams per square meter per year

unit.name: kilogramPerMeterSquaredPerSecond
unit.description: kilograms per square meter per second

unit.name: kilogramPerMeterSquaredPerYear
unit.description: kilograms per square meter per year

unit.name: molePerMeterSquaredPerSecond
unit.description: micromoles per square meter per second

unit.name: micromolePerMeterSquaredPerSecond
unit.description: micromoles per square meter per second
